DOC.detailed_description: Objectives : To notify effect aspiration excessive endometrial fluid addition Diosmin case undergo intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) cycle . Study design : Prospective randomized control clinical trial . Patients Methods : 200 woman excessive endometrial fluid transvaginal ultrasound ICSI cycle randomly schedule two equal group . In group A , one tab every 8 h Diosmin ( 500mg ) begin day ovum retrieval addition aspiration fluid IUI catheter ; group B ( control group ) , thing give do . The main outcome measure presence fluid day embryo transfer pregnancy rate patient .
